data.name: Demon's Run
data.detailed_description:
Demon's Run is a multiplayer shooter, play as the most terrifying beings throughout space and time and fight to control unique battlefields.
Join our official discord server below to find players and chat with devs.
Lobby's currently support 12v12 in this arena style ability shooter featuring a variety of playable characters, and modifiable loadouts. Go head to head in Free For All, TDM, CTF, Domination, Rush, or Kill Confirmed.
data.about_the_game:
Demon's Run is a multiplayer shooter, play as the most terrifying beings throughout space and time and fight to control unique battlefields.
Join our official discord server below to find players and chat with devs.
Lobby's currently support 12v12 in this arena style ability shooter featuring a variety of playable characters, and modifiable loadouts. Go head to head in Free For All, TDM, CTF, Domination, Rush, or Kill Confirmed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
